Cord Cutting Meditation Release toxic relationship co-dependency: energetic independence, unhealthy attachments, own your energy, powerful assertiveness, spiritual parasites, psychic attackAutor:
[ThinkAndBloom](/co/es/authors/646544-ThinkAndBloom)Narrador: [Chantalia](/co/es/narrators/374004-Chantalia)Audiolibro
Do you feel drained by a relationship and want to release the toxic ties? Do you feel your boundaries are being pushed? Do you feel stuck in a connection and need to cut the invisible cords?
This Cutting Cords Guided Meditation is aimed at cutting the invisible toxic ties in a relationship. It could be family members, friends, co-workers, or intimate partners. It is particularly useful for those who are empaths or extra-sensitive to other people’s energies. It serves to protect us from further harm in our mental and emotional bodies.
In this course, we will
• Disassociate your energetic cords
• Let go of the toxic relationship
• Own your power
• Release psychic attack
• Create powerful boundary
• Honor your sensitivities
• Protect your energetic body
• And much more
After cutting the cords, you will feel calmer and re-balance yourself back to the center.
[Living32](/co/es/publishers/18380-Living32)(Audiolibro) ISBN: 9781669612391
